ProjectTitle: Sixty Donatist Sermons from the 5th Century? A Critical Edition and Content Analysis of the ‘Vienna Collection’.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/02/2023
Documentation and Metadata: Will you use RDM tools that generate metadata, for example Zotero, Tropy or Nvivo, or does the BiblIndex database use metadata? For more information see: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/tools, www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata, or make an appointment with a RMD advisor via rdm@kuleuven.be 
Storage: You list 4 storage locations, are these for different datasets? Normally one location with automatic backup should be sufficient, please take a look at the storage guide: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en. Also note that onedrive is not suitable for long term preservation since this is linked to your account and expires when you leave. 
Sharing: KU Leuven also has a data repository RDR that you can consider to use for data sharing: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
